content.body:
Hello, I'm thinking about allowing purge(/access to) module import cache in ECMAScript.
What do you think about this?
content.formatted_body:
Hello, I'm thinking about allowing purge(/access to) module import cache in ECMAScript.
What do you think about this?

content.body: Being able to access the module cache will make HMR easier, without restarting the entire environment or bundling things together.
content.formatted_body: Being able to access the module cache will make HMR easier, without restarting the entire environment or bundling things together.
